Celebrating 100 years with style

High tech. Family owned. Cool theme. Amazing milestone. How do you encompass all that in a promotional product?

Our client, Trumpf, celebrated their 100th anniversary last year and needed a commemorative gift for 600 New England office employees at their holiday gala. Discussions began around the 1920s theme and quickly moved to prohibition, and of course, whiskey.

And what could be better than whiskey, while giving a nod to New England?

Our team sourced an old-fashioned liquor bottle that matched the style Trumpf had in mind and had them custom etched. For the finishing touch, we tracked down a small-batch Vermont sugarmaker to fill them with fresh maple syrup.

The result was a perfect gift that fit the theme, looked stunning at the event and could be enjoyed at home with each employeeâ€™s family then reused for years to come. Both the celebration and the gift were a huge success that boosted employee morale and fostered pride in achieving 100 years in business.
